timeline.message: add feature to set maximum number of complaints + add unittests
ensure ModelFactory maxComplaints same as before
add maxComplaintTimeWeeks option to course creation and update course db schema

* change maxComplaintTime in weeks to days + add notnullconstraint and default value
* add notnullconstraint for maxComplaints and default value
* questions are also disabled on lectures if studentQuestionsEnabled is false
* renamed qna_enabled to student_questions_enabled

timeline.bodyText: please delete the old changelog and make sure the new one is atomic, so only adding the new column, no deletions
timeline.author: krusche
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+<?xml version="1.1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
+<databaseChangeLog xmlns="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog" xmlns:ext="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog-ext http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-ext.xsd http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog http://www.liquibase.org/xml/ns/dbchangelog/dbchangelog-3.5.xsd">
+    <changeSet author="jonathantumboimbela" id="20200213171522">
+        <addColumn tableName="course">
+            <column name="max_complaint_time_weeks" type="integer"/>
+        </addColumn>
+        <addColumn tableName="course">
+            <column name="qna_enabled" type="Boolean" defaultValueBoolean="true">

timeline.bodyText:
please add a switch button to enable / disable the whole feature.
If it is enabled, only positive values are allowed.
Disabled basically sets both values to 0 and then means that the complaint and more feedback request functionality is not displayed in the rest of the application

timeline.bodyText:
this is not 100% correct. After this period, students won't be able to complain any more.
Also please mention that the period refers to days after the result is available to the student (i.e. after the assessment due date or after the result date, depending on which of them is later)

* corrected default value for max complaints
* check disables both max complaint and max complaint time days fields
* corrected description
